      • newAuthParams

        public BaseSource.AuthParams newAuthParams(String name,
                                  long expires)
        Creates a set of auth parameters that can be used for this source
        Parameters:
        name - a human friendly name for this auth set
        expires - identity resource expiry date/time as a UTC timestamp
        Returns:
        a new auth set
